table.high_low_label: High {{high}} and low {{low}} {{currency}} in the last 24 hours

charts.line_region_label: Line chart showing price and market capitalization
charts.line_description: Chart showing the variation of current price and market capitalization for the top {{value}} cryptocurrencies.

accessibility_charts.pie_region_label: Pie chart showing percentage changes of cryptocurrencies
accessibility_charts.pie_description: This chart shows the 24-hour percentage variations of the top {{value}} cryptocurrencies.
accessibility_charts.pie_data_summary: Accessible data of the pie chart
accessibility_charts.pie_data_intro: Below are the percentage changes represented in the chart:

accessibility_bar_chart.title: Top {{value}} - Trading Volume (24h)

accessibility_bar_chart.description: This chart shows the trading volume of the top {{value}} cryptocurrencies in the last 24 hours.
accessibility_bar_chart.data_summary: Accessible data of the bar chart
